name: MaticVerse
description: Maticverse is a BSc and Polygon cross-chain token. Maticverse offers a series of combat PlayToEarn games combined with unique functional NFTs. Proven tokenomics and a goal to be the leading launchpad and marketplace. We believe utility and transparency is crucial and are always seeking to improve and introduce new features and exciting things in the space of DeFi, Gaming and cryptocurrency as a whole.
